item.title: Building a Resilient SOC: Proactive Cybersecurity for Modern Threats
item.category: "Cybersecurity" , "Technology" , "Business" , "Data Protection" , "Incident Response" , "IT Management" , "Network Security" , "Threat Detection" , "Information Security" , "Risk Management"
item.description: Establish a robust Security Operations Center (SOC) to defend against evolving cyber threats, detect incidents, and safeguard your organization's assets.
